title: Pardon my ignorance
content:
Can anyone please identify this font? I know it’s common and I thought I know it, but it seems I cannot match it with my existing fonts.

It is part of the low resolution logo file I’m trying to reconstruct.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905125605im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/logo_5681.jpg)

 [‹ Book: Epic Rivalry](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905125605/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45317 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please Identify ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905125605/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45313 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mikemanuel
